name: Charlemagne
description: Charlemagne is the Discord bot that provides detailed access to Destiny 2 information. She is equipped with stats, clan ranking, and LFG.

name: Lost Sector Bot
description: View Destiny 2's legend and master Lost Sector and GM Nightfall information in your server using our new verified Discord bot.

name: PatchBot
description: Subscribe to game updates and patch notes... delivered right to your Discord server!
